node.name: image
node.label: image
node.author: mesh
node.help: Useful for connecting string inputs to ImageViewer.
node.control_code: print ":: Hello from %s XML code !!!" % self.label inputImage = self.getInputParamValueByName ( 'input' ).strip ('"') outputParam = self.getOutputParamByName ( 'output' ) outputParam.setValue ( inputImage )
